text:
Ohh here's the story...
Maine 10 june 2025 ko ola s1 pro (UP-65-EU-5227) car se "rope tow" kar k service centre ko handover ki, aaj 18 aug hai abhi tak gaadi nhi mili, problem thi ki battery 35% se drop hokar 0 ho gayi, service centre manager call nhi recieve karta rude behave Karta hai, pressure dene par bolta hai, mai kya kar sakta hu (technically he's right) uski kya galti jab battery waha se repair hi hokar nahi aa rahi... Helpline pe call karne par bol rahe hai "sir we will revert back soon" kabhi call nahi aayi aaj tak, mat lena bhai kabhi bhi mere pass shares bhi hai 450 quantity DESHBHAKTI kaho ya personal intrest support kiya maine, promote karke apne padosi ko bhi dilayi, aaj wo bhi pareshan hai shameful hai ye sab personal life impact karti hai ye aafat, Activa hai wahi kaam aa rahi june se üò¢, mat lena bhai please mat lena ro doge
